GUI

Class InventoryPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • GUI.InventoryPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class InventoryPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer
    One of the panels that is displayed constantly by the GameView class. Provides the player with information about what items that are equipped and what items that are stored in the players inventory.
    Author:
    kristoffer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
